title: Correction to: Ganoderma from Cuba: an approach to some species based on morphology and phylogenetic analyses
content: This is a correction to: Milay Cabarroi-Hernández, Cony Decock, Stéphane Welti, Mario Amalfi, Alma Rosa Villalobos-Arámbula, Daniela Aliaga-Ramos, Guillermo Morera, Emilia Macedo-Pérez Sandi, Abel Almarales Castro, Laura Guzmán-Dávalos, Ganoderma from Cuba: an approach to some species based on morphology and phylogenetic analyses, Biological Journal of the Linnean Society, 2023;, blad055, https://doi.org/10.1093/biolinnean/blad055
siteTitle: Biological Journal of the Linnean Society Current Issue
